name: seventysix-loadtests
description: k6 load testing infrastructure for SeventySix API

scripts.test:quick: k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/health/health-check.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/auth/login.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/auth/token-refresh.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/auth/logout.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/auth/registration.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/users/create-user.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/users/update-user.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/users/get-users-paged.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/users/bulk-operations.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/permissions/request-permission.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/permissions/grant-permission.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/logs/client-log.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=quick scenarios/logs/client-log-batch.test.js
scripts.test:load: k6 run --env PROFILE=load scenarios/health/health-check.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=load scenarios/auth/login.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=load scenarios/auth/token-refresh.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=load scenarios/auth/logout.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=load scenarios/users/create-user.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=load scenarios/users/get-users-paged.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=load scenarios/logs/client-log.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=load scenarios/logs/client-log-batch.test.js
scripts.test:stress: k6 run --env PROFILE=stress scenarios/health/health-check.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=stress scenarios/auth/login.test.js && k6 run --env PROFILE=stress scenarios/logs/client-log.test.js
